Class PerMonthSchedule

  • java.lang.Object
    • students1.Schedule
      • students1.PerMonthSchedule

  • public class PerMonthSchedule
extends students1.Schedule
    This is code for Part 2. Create a subclass named PerMonthSchedule. This is a schedule of activities that happen on the same day every month.
